headline: Jim Cramer on Honeywell: “Charitable Trust is in This One for the Long Haul”
summary: Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer commented on. Cramer discussed the company’s upcoming spin-offs, as he commented: “I want to highlight the most unheralded Honeywell breakup, the spinoff of its advanced materials division as Solstice, followed by the spinoff of its automation business. And I really like this one… Solstice […]

headline: Smart Infrastructure Market Surges to $2,109.5 billion by 2029 - Dominated by Siemens (Germany), Cisco, (US), Honeywell (US)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Oct. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Smart Infrastructure Market is projected to grow from USD 923.0 billion in 2024 to USD 2,109.5 billion by 2029 at a CAGR of 18.0% during the forecast period. headline: How Investors May Respond To Honeywell International (HON) Expanding Into Data Center Power Management With LS ELECTRIC
summary: On October 8, 2025, LS ELECTRIC announced a global strategic collaboration with Honeywell International to develop and market integrated hardware and software solutions that simplify power management and distribution for data centers and large building operators, aiming to improve efficiency and resiliency. This partnership positions Honeywell as a one-stop supplier for both building automation and advanced electrical power products, directly targeting the rapidly rising energy needs of the...

headline: HONEYWELL FORECAST SHOWS DEMAND FOR NEW BUSINESS JETS AT RECORD LEVELS, CONTINUED GROWTH EXPECTED FOR NEXT DECADE
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) today published its 34th annual Global Business Aviation Outlook, which forecasts a record-setting number of new business jet deliveries over the next decade. The report provides unique insights into current industry trends and longer-cycle developments based on forecasting models and surveys of hundreds of business aviation operators across the globe.
